title: INTERNET STUDIES - Lecturer: Fabio Giglietto - A.Y. 2024/2025 - Credits 8 - UniUrb
snippet: This page lists Fabio Giglietto as the lecturer for the Internet Studies course at the University of Urbino for the academic year 2024/2025. It outlines the course syllabus, including topics like media manipulation, internet subcultures, and research methods for social media analysis.
description: This UniUrb webpage lists Fabio Giglietto as the lecturer for the Internet Studies course for the 2024/2025 academic year, including topics within his areas of expertise.

title: Fabio Giglietto - Professore Ordinario GSPS-06/A Sociologia dei processi culturali e comunicativi - UniUrb
snippet: This is Fabio Giglietto's profile page on the University of Urbino website. It provides his contact information, including phone number and email address, and lists the courses he teaches.
description: This is Fabio Giglietto's profile page on the University of Urbino website, listing his position, contact information, and courses taught.

Advancing Research on Disinformation and Digital Manipulation: The University of Urbino at two Key Conferences in Brazil – vera.ai VERification Assisted by Artificial Intelligence
snippet: Fabio Giglietto moderated a roundtable discussion on 'Ruptures in Data Access: The State of Social Media Research APIs & Tools in the DSA Era' and presented collaborative research on analyzing political discourse using fine-tuned large language models (LLMs) to examine political talk in hyperpartisan Facebook groups at conferences in Brazil.
description: The content discusses Fabio Giglietto's participation in conferences in Brazil, where he moderated a roundtable on data access and presented research on analyzing political discourse using LLMs in hyperpartisan Facebook groups.

title: Il movimento religioso cinese che si è infiltrato in un gruppo Facebook urbinate - il Ducato
Who is behind vera.ai? Meet the people and teams that make up the vera.ai project. #8 Team of University of Urbino Carlo Bo
snippet: This article introduces Fabio Giglietto as the leader of the Uniurb team within the vera.ai project. It details his role in coordinating Work Package 4 (WP4), which focuses on detecting potentially problematic content through social media analysis and network science methods.
description: This vera.ai article introduces Fabio Giglietto as the leader of the Uniurb team for the vera.ai project, coordinating work on detecting problematic content via social media analysis.
